name: Incendiary Grenade
tooltip:
Throws a grenade which after <d ref="duckiesGravenGrenade_PrecursorPersistent.effect_expire_delay"/> seconds will explode for <d ref="duckiesGravenGrenade_DamageRadius.amount" style="Red"/> damage and ignite ground.

Ignited ground deals <d ref="duckiesGravenGrenade_GroundDoTDamage.amount/duckiesGravenGrenade_GroundDoTPersistent.periodic.durations[0]" style="Red"/> damage per second and lasts <d ref="duckiesGravenGrenade_GroundDoTPersistent.periodic.durations[0]*(duckiesGravenGrenade_GroundDoTPersistent.periodic.count+1)"/> seconds.
